contentHtml:
Write a programme to print first n even numbers

Input  : 5
Output : 0 2 4 6 8

n = int(input("Enter n : "))
for i in range(0, 2*n):
    if(i % 2 == 0):
        print(i, end=" ")

import java.util.Scanner;

public class PrintEven {
  public static int[] printEven(int num) {
    int[] arr = new int[num];
    int i = 0;
    while (i < num) {
      arr[i] = i * 2;
      i++;
    }
    return arr;
  }

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
    System.out.print("Input  : ");
    int num = sc.nextInt();
    int[] arr = printEven(num);
    System.out.print("Output : ");
    for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {
      System.out.print(arr[i] + " ");
    }
    System.out.println();
    sc.close();
  }
}

#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
    int n;
    printf("Input  : ");
    scanf("%d", &n);
    printf("Output : ");
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)
    {
        printf("%d ", 2 * i);
    }
    printf("%d\n", 2 * (n - 1));
    return 0;
}

#include <iostream>

int main(void)
{
    int n;
    std::cout << "Input  : ";
    std::cin >> n;
    std::cout << "Output : ";
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++)
    {
        std::cout << 2 * i << " ";
    }
    std::cout << 2 * (n - 1) << std::endl;
    return 0;
}
